Interface FeatureIndex<F>

  • Type Parameters:
    F - type of the features
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FastFeatureData<I,F,V>, FastFeatureIndex<F>, FeatureData<I,F,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFastFeatureData, SimpleFastFeatureData, SimpleFastFeatureIndex, SimpleFeatureData

    public interface FeatureIndex<F>
    Index for a set of features.

    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)

      Checks whether the index contains a feature.

    • Method Detail

      • containsFeature

        boolean containsFeature(F f)
        Checks whether the index contains a feature.
        Parameters:
        f - feature
        Returns:
        true if the index contains the feature, false otherwise

      • numFeatures

        int numFeatures()
        Counts the number of indexed features.
        Returns:
        the total number of features

      • getAllFeatures

        Stream<F> getAllFeatures()
        Retrieves a stream of the indexed features.
        Returns:
        a stream of all the features
